title: Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq slide after Trump picks Warsh for Fed; gold, silver plunge
full_text: Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq slide after Trump picks Warsh for Fed; gold, silver plunge. Major gauges are set to end the week higher with earnings and the Fed holding investor attention.. US stocks slid on Friday as President Trump said he would nominate Kevin Warsh to lead the Federal Reserve, against a background of a rising dollar and a screeching halt to 2026's roaring metals rall… [+16045 chars]
